PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-05632018-05-17,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of CHRISTIANNE M. LAIZNER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member and Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 17, 2018.
